mapper.select: SELECT top 1 eid,t_time,t_value from zone where DAY(t_time)=#{day} AND MONTH(t_time)=#{month} AND YEAR(t_time)=#{year} and eid=#{eid} ORDER BY t_time DESC
select eid,t_value,t_time from zone where eid=#{eid} and t_time >= #{starttime} and t_time <= #{endTime} ORDER BY t_time

SELECT eid,t_time,t_value FROM (SELECT top 2 eid,t_time,t_value from zone where DAY(t_time)=#{startDay} AND MONTH(t_time)=#{startMonth} AND YEAR(t_time)=#{startYear} and eid in(26,27) ORDER BY t_time) as a1 UNION SELECT eid,t_time,t_value FROM (SELECT top 2 eid,t_time,t_value from zone where DAY(t_time)=#{endDay} AND MONTH(t_time)=#{endMonth} AND YEAR(t_time)=#{endYear} and eid in(26,27) ORDER BY t_time DESC) as a2 ORDER BY t_time
SELECT top 2 eid,t_time,t_value from zone where DAY(t_time)=#{day} AND MONTH(t_time)=#{month} AND YEAR(t_time)=#{year} and eid in(26,27) ORDER BY t_time DESC
select TOP 2 eid,t_time,t_value from zone where MONTH(t_time)=#{month} AND YEAR(t_time)=#{year} and eid in(26,27) ORDER BY t_time

WITH orderIndex as ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER () over(ORDER BY t_time,eid) as numIndex, eid,t_value,t_time from zone where t_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} and eid in(26,27)
),countindex as( SELECT count(numIndex) as total from orderIndex ) SELECT eid, t_value,t_time FROM orderIndex where numIndex in(1,2) or numIndex in((SELECT total from countindex)-1,(SELECT total from countindex))

SELECT a1.eid,a1.t_value,a1.t_time from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER () over(ORDER BY t_time,eid) as numIndex, eid,t_value,t_time,(select count(eid) from zone where t_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} and eid in(26,27)) as total from zone where t_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} and eid in(26,27) )as a1 LEFT JOIN(
SELECT ROW_NUMBER () over(ORDER BY t_time,eid) as numIndex, eid,t_value,t_time from zone where t_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} and eid in(26,27)) as a2 on a1.numIndex=a2.numIndex where a1.numIndex in(1,2) or a1.numIndex in(a1.total-1,a1.total)
